QuestData.Title: Stormheim
QuestData.Description:
It is good we found you, $n!
Nathanos Blightcaller, Champion of the Banshee Queen herself, sent for you in Dalaran. He made it sound urgent. He should be waiting for you in the Violet Citadel.
Make haste!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Nathanos Blightcaller at the Violet Citadel in Dalaran.
